synopsis.text:
Namae wo Bokutachi wa Mada Shiranai. takes us back to the serene Chichibu city, where two sisters, Akane and Aoi Aioi, have shared a life together since their parents' untimely demise 13 years ago. Akane, the older sister, sacrificed her dreams to care for Aoi, who now aspires to pursue a musical career in Tokyo to alleviate her sister's burden.

Their lives take an unexpected turn when Shinnosuke Kanemuro, Akane's former boyfriend and a struggling guitarist, returns to the city for a music festival. The plot thickens as a younger version of Shinnosuke, affectionately called Shinno, mysteriously appears from the past. As Aoi finds herself falling for the 18-year-old Shinno, Akane and the older Shinnosuke reconnect, stirring up a whirlwind of emotions and long-forgotten memories.

Amidst this complex web of love and time, the story unfolds as these four individuals grapple with their inner feelings and make decisions that will forever alter their lives. With a perfect blend of romance, youthful desires, and time travel, this anime promises a heartwarming and captivating experience.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
